source:
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Riqi-Mao is anything but calm.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Riqi-Mao semble complètement paniquée.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_00<tab>Aller trouver le dresseur d'amaros zun, dans la forêt du Berger égaré

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_TODO_01<tab>Use the whittled whistle to search for the amaro.
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_000<tab>You there! Get ready to run! Time is of the essence!
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_000<tab>C-c'est un désastre... Voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var><var 1D /var>! Pourriez-vous me rendre un grrrand service<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_001<tab>Our new amaro has escaped into the forest! The carnivorous-beast-and-bandit-filled forest! Wicked white, my contacts at the Crystarium told me it was meant to be <var 1A 02 /var>trained<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_001<tab>L'amaro que Cristarium nous a envoyé s'est enfui en direction de la forêt du Berger égaré<var 1D /var>! Il y a beaucoup de bêtes carrrnivores dans les environs, il faut vite le rattraper, sinon...

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_002<tab>Anyway, we need as many people as possible out there looking for it. Its handler is leading the search─as he <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var>─in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd. Go, go!
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_002<tab>Bien sûrrr, je vous offre une récompense si vous le retrouvez<var 1D /var>! Allez proposer votre aide au dresseur d'amaros zun, qui est lui aussi en train de le chercher dans la forêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_003<tab>Why are you still standing here!? Run, run!
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_003<tab>Allez prrroposer votre aide au dresseur d'amaros zun, qui est lui aussi en train de le chercher dans la forêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_010<tab>You've come to aid in the search? Excellent.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_010<tab>À chercher l'amaro, tu vas m'aider<var 1D /var>? Un fier service, tu me rends<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_011<tab>It's this amaro's first time out of the Crystarium, and he got a bit spooked. Took off before I could stop him─it's instinctual, you understand. He should still respond to this, though.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_011<tab>Bien dressés, mes amaros sont. À répondre au bruit de ce sifflet, je les ai entraînés.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_012<tab>That whistle produces a tone that all of our amaro have been trained since birth to react to. Blow it loudly, and then listen for his cry. If he's nearby, you'll know.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_012<tab>Pour chercher l'amaro, ce sifflet, utilise. Viens me chercher si un problème, tu as.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_013<tab>It's possible that he will be too skittish to follow you back. If so, please return here and let me know.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_013<tab>Pour chercher l'amaro, ce sifflet, utilise. Viens me chercher si un problème, tu as.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The amaro gives a weak cry at the sound of the whistle, turning his eyes in your direction. Perhaps he will respond to you, if you speak to him soothingly...
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>C'est l'amaro perdu. Il semble vous faire confiance grâce au sifflet en votre possession. Essayez de vous approcher.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>You hear the faint cry of an amaro. He must be nearby.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Vous pouvez entendre un amaro gémir. Il se trouve pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment dans les parages.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>You hear nothing in reply to the shrill tone of the whistle.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Vous n'entendez pas l'animal. Continuez vos recherches.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The amaro trembles, apparently unable to move due to injury, fear, or both. Hopefully his handler will know what to do.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>L'amaro semble blessé et ne peut pas bouger. Allez de ce pas prévenir le dresseur zun.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_100_030<tab>You're back already? Does that mean you found him?
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_030<tab>He can't move!? Poor thing! I must go to him at once!
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_ZUN03382_000_030<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Le sauver, je dois<var 1D /var>! Prévenir Riqi-Mao, je te laisse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>The amaro's eyes are filled with something like gratitude as it looks toward you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>L'amaro blessé semble vous être très re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_040<tab>If you're back, it had better be because you found the amaro...
TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_041<tab>Oh, you did! In that case─thank you. We really couldn't have afforded to lose such a valuable resource.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB004_03382_RIQIMAO_000_041<tab>Ahhh, c'est une bonne nouvelle<var 1D /var>! Nous avons vraiment besoin de ces monturrres... J'oubliais, voilà pour vous, merci encore<var 1D /var>!
